main.name: Widya Ageng
main.description: Full Time engineer, Part time trader and freeloader xD...
main.bio: I like to do both hardware and software stuff, been 8 years+ doing it. Now, I am in progress to leverage the engineering knowledge that I have to build decent asset portfolio. I daytrade at night (except 3rd Friday of the month), checking swingtrade opportunity during weekend and occassionaly do forex spot when ta looking good...I also play FIFA when I have time
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: I am using following stack, might get rusty sometimes, but hey every projects are using different resources and I am not a bot with plugins.

education.description: Too many projects until I didnt know that I was studying in NUS. Reading intelligent control modules, deep learning (CNN/RNN/Vanilla) and other bayesian/non-bayesian AI (pattern recognition, SVM, PCA, LDA etc).
Specialized in control engineering and higher-level analog system/circuit. Anyway, it's ulu place, the furthest I went was Jurong East to find good non-campus food

work.title: Senior Engineer
work.description: Developing programs using Python, MSSQLDatabase, Labview. Trying to talk to hardwares and push the datastreams to user-level app/programs to monitor

work.title: Engineer
work.description: Hardware intensive, was using Matlab/Simulink and python to analyze it.. fun but tiring.

work.title: Associate Engineer
work.description: Full hands-on hardware, most of the maths in uni were used heavily in Analog + working with C/C++ most of the time to troubleshoot/debug microcontroller things/signal processor
